title: Compensation for failure to protect data
summary: Body corporate shall be liable to pay compensation for negligence in maintaining reasonable security practices.

title: Hacking punishment
summary: Any person who dishonestly accesses computer resources shall be punished with imprisonment and fine.

title: Lawful processing of personal data
summary: Personal data must be processed lawfully, fairly, and with the consent of the data principal.

title: Identity theft
summary: Impersonation using electronic means is punishable with imprisonment and fine.

title: Cheating by impersonation
summary: Cheating by electronic impersonation attracts punishment under the IT Act.

title: Violation of privacy
summary: Capturing images or videos of a person without consent is punishable under IT law.

title: Obscene content online
summary: Publishing or transmitting obscene material in electronic form is an offense.

title: Child pornography
summary: Transmission of sexually explicit content involving minors attracts severe punishment.

title: Cyber terrorism
summary: Electronic content promoting terror or violence is punishable.

title: Consent withdrawal
summary: Data principal can withdraw consent at any time, and processing must stop.

title: Computer system damage
summary: Unauthorized access leading to damage of computer systems is punishable.

title: Disclosure of information
summary: Disclosure of personal information without consent is punishable.

title: Tampering with computer source documents
summary: Intentional damage to source code is an offense.

title: Publication for fraudulent purposes
summary: Electronic publishing for fraud or cheating is punishable.

title: Right to correction
summary: Data principal can request correction or modification of personal data.

title: Right to erasure
summary: Data principal can request deletion of personal data.

title: Cyber forgery
summary: Forgery using digital means is punishable.

title: Identity theft online
summary: Using someone else's digital identity without authorization is an offense.

title: Breach of network security
summary: Unauthorized intrusion into computer networks is punishable.

title: Cyber extortion
summary: Threatening to harm a system unless ransom is paid is punishable.

title: Safe harbor for intermediaries
summary: Intermediaries not liable if due diligence is followed.

title: Liability of network service providers
summary: Service providers must follow reasonable security practices.

title: Cyber stalking
summary: Stalking via electronic means is punishable.

title: Cyber bullying
summary: Bullying or harassment online is an offense.

title: Phishing attacks
summary: Sending fraudulent messages to extract sensitive information is punishable.

title: Email spoofing
summary: Impersonating someone via email is punishable.

title: Malware distribution
summary: Spreading malicious software is punishable.

title: Purpose limitation
summary: Personal data must be collected for a clear, lawful purpose.

title: Data minimization
summary: Only necessary personal data can be collected.

title: Accuracy of personal data
summary: Personal data must be accurate and up-to-date.

title: Storage limitation
summary: Personal data should not be kept longer than necessary.

title: Security safeguards
summary: Reasonable security safeguards must be applied to personal data.

title: Cyber espionage
summary: Unauthorized access for spying or data theft is punishable.

title: Ransomware attacks
summary: Using malware to extort money is punishable.

title: Denial of service attacks
summary: Launching DoS attacks is punishable.

title: Social engineering attacks
summary: Using deception to gain access to systems is punishable.

title: Cryptojacking
summary: Unauthorized use of someone else’s computer to mine cryptocurrency is punishable.

title: Unauthorized IoT access
summary: Accessing Internet-of-Things devices without authorization is punishable.

title: Spyware deployment
summary: Installing spyware on devices without consent is punishable.

title: Botnet attacks
summary: Using a network of compromised devices to attack is punishable.

title: Rogue AI usage
summary: Using AI systems for illegal purposes is punishable.

title: Data breach notification
summary: Data controllers must notify data principals in case of a breach.

title: Cross-border data transfer
summary: Personal data can only be transferred internationally under strict conditions.

title: Processing of sensitive data
summary: Sensitive personal data requires higher level of protection.

title: Cyber fraud
summary: Fraudulent activities using computers are punishable.

title: Unauthorized digital signatures
summary: Using digital signatures without authorization is punishable.

title: Illegal software distribution
summary: Distribution of pirated or malicious software is punishable.

title: Online financial fraud
summary: Fraud through electronic banking or payment systems is punishable.

title: Cryptocurrency scams
summary: Scams involving cryptocurrency are punishable under law.

title: Unauthorized cloud access
summary: Accessing cloud storage without permission is punishable.

title: Cyber terrorism threats
summary: Any act threatening national security via digital systems is punishable under cyber terrorism provisions.

title: Sensitive financial data protection
summary: Financial personal data must be handled with strict consent and encryption.

title: Critical infrastructure hacking
summary: Unauthorized access to critical systems like power grids, banks, and transport networks is punishable.

title: Digital fraud and deception
summary: Cheating using electronic means is prosecutable under fraud provisions of IPC.

title: Social media impersonation
summary: Creating fake accounts to harm reputation or mislead users is punishable.

title: Biometric data safeguards
summary: Biometric data must be stored securely with restricted access.

title: Phishing and spear-phishing attacks
summary: Sending emails or messages to steal confidential data is punishable.

title: Ransomware deployment
summary: Deploying ransomware to demand ransom or disrupt systems is illegal.

title: Children's data protection
summary: Special protection measures are required when handling minors’ personal data.

title: Deepfake and AI content misuse
summary: Using AI-generated content to mislead, defame, or commit fraud is punishable.

title: IoT device hacking
summary: Unauthorized access to Internet-of-Things devices is an offense.

title: Health data privacy
summary: Medical and health-related personal data must be processed securely.

title: Cloud data breaches
summary: Compromising cloud-stored personal or corporate data is punishable.

title: Botnet operation
summary: Operating or using botnets for DDoS or attacks is illegal.

title: Cryptojacking unauthorized use
summary: Using someone’s computing resources to mine cryptocurrency without permission is punishable.

title: Data portability rights
summary: Data principals can request transfer of personal data between controllers securely.

title: Cyber espionage and spying
summary: Spying on organizations or individuals digitally is punishable.

title: Denial of service attacks
summary: Launching DoS or DDoS attacks against systems is illegal.

title: Unauthorized access to government networks
summary: Gaining access to sensitive government networks without authorization is punishable.

title: Cyber harassment

title: Cross-border health data transfer

title: Unauthorized AI manipulation

title: Social engineering attacks
summary: Deceptive practices to gain system access are punishable.

title: Deepfake fraud

title: Unauthorized drone access
summary: Hacking drones or UAVs for illegal purposes is punishable.

title: IoT botnet attacks
summary: Compromising IoT devices to launch attacks is illegal.

summary: Threatening data exposure unless ransom is paid is punishable.

title: Unauthorized cryptocurrency exchange hacks
summary: Hacking crypto exchanges is punishable under law.

summary: Exploiting VPN services without permission is punishable.
